Plot: Lisbeth is recovering in a hospital and awaiting trial for three murders when she is released. Mikael must prove her innocence, but Lisbeth must be willing to share the details of her sordid experiences with the court.
Title: The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest
Actors: Michael Nyqvist, Noomi Rapace, Lena Endre, Annika Hallin
tomatoConsensus: Slow and mostly devoid of the stellar chemistry between its two leads, The Girl Who Kicked The Hornet's Nest is a disappointingly uneven conclusion to the Millennium trilogy.
